title: Matty Longstaff who scored winner against Manchester United 'earns just £850 a week'
text:
Matty Longstaff earns just £850 a week and is a free agent this summer.

The Newcastle youngster scored the winner on his Premier League debut against Manchester United last weekend.

The goal in the 71st minute gave Steve Bruce's side a crucial three points and piled the pressure on Red Devils boss Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.

Matty Longstaff is on the radar of England Under 21s for future squads after recent showings

Now according to the Sun, Longstaff is still on the first pofessional deal he signed in 2018 which expires at the end of the season.

Newcastle chiefs are eager to ensure both Matty and his brother Sean stay on Tyneside.

Matty is free to talk to foreign clubs in January, should he have offers from abroad.

Sean has been tipped with a £50million move to Old Trafford.

Bruce has been under pressure recently and thanks to Longstaff's winner that will have reduced some pressure.
description: Matty Longstaff earns just £850 a week and is a free agent this summer. The Newcastle youngster scored the winner on his Premier League debut against Manchester United last weekend.
